*R/gf_interface.R*

## gf_unpersist

## Description
Unpersist the GraphFrame 


## Usage
```r
gf_unpersist(x, blocking = FALSE) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An object coercable to a GraphFrame (typically, a `gf_graphframe`). |
| blocking | whether to block until all blocks are deleted |
